price: - Il dit : “Qu’Allah nous garde de prendre un autre que celui chez qui nous avons trouvé notre bien ! Nous serions alors vraiment injustes.
arabic: قَالَ مَعَاذَ ٱللَّهِ أَن نَّأۡخُذَ إِلَّا مَن وَجَدۡنَا مَتَٰعَنَا عِندَهُۥٓ إِنَّآ إِذٗا لَّظَٰلِمُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Muhammad Hamidullah
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Muhammad Hamidullah. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: qāla maʿādha al-lahi an nakhudha illā man wajadnā matāʿanā ʿindahu innā idhan laẓālimūna
